title: Limited edition pro pink CANYON//SRAM Racing Grail CF SL gravel glory replica, in stock now
content:
CANYON//SRAM Racing pro Tiffany Cromwell took a break from Women’s WorldTour racing this summer to hit the gravel circuit in the USA on a special pro pink carbon Grail CF SL gravel bike. Now that she’s wrapped up her race season after a Belgian Waffle win in Kansas a week ago, and headed to Mexico

The post Limited edition pro pink CANYON//SRAM Racing Grail CF SL gravel glory replica, in stock now appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
